timeline.bodyText: Would it be better to initialize the rate limiters up front, rather than calling computeIfAbsent on each request? I don't have a sense of how large this optimization is, feels minor but I also feel it can't hurt. Feel free to disagree.

replies.bodyText:
Yeah, you're right.  The data is static and not large, so why not just make an immutable map instead on initialization?
I was originally thinking it might be dynamic, but it's not currently.
